description: MainActivity.kt defines the main entry point of an Android app built with Jetpack Compose. It sets up the app theme, manages navigation between screens such as the list of notes, creating/editing notes, and viewing notes. It also includes the implementation of the Compose UI components for these screens and uses an in-memory repository for note data management.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main entry point of the app, hosting the Compose setContent method.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity and sets the Compose content with OceanProfessionalNotesApp.

methods.name: OceanProfessionalNotesApp
methods.description: Sets up the app theme, manages navigation state, and composes screens based on user interaction.

methods.name: TopBar
methods.description: Displays the top app bar with back navigation and screen title.

methods.name: NotesListScreen
methods.description: Displays a list of notes retrieved from the repository, with loading and empty states.

methods.name: NoteCard
methods.description: Represents a single note item in the list, showing title and snippet of body.

methods.name: CreateEditScreen
methods.description: Allows creating a new note or editing an existing one, with validation.

methods.name: ViewNoteScreen
methods.description: Displays a note in detail with options to edit or delete.

methods.name: LoadingState
methods.description: Displays a loading message during data fetch.

methods.name: EmptyState
methods.description: Shows a message when no data is available.
